Expedited Delivery.Elite 1: After a thrown or returning Thunderlance or Thunderlance EX hits the enemy, Avywenna gains 3 Ultimate Energy.
Expedited Delivery.Elite 2: After a thrown or returning Thunderlance or Thunderlance EX hits the enemy, Avywenna gains 4 Ultimate Energy.

Tactful Approach.Elite 2: Ultimate Thunderlance: Final Shock improved: Also applies 6% Electric Susceptibility for 10s to enemies it hits.
Tactful Approach.Elite 3: Ultimate Thunderlance: Final Shock improved: Also applies 10% Electric Susceptibility for 10s to enemies it hits.

Residence Advisor.Elite 1: Assign to Control Nexus to grant all operators' Mood Regen +8%
Residence Advisor.Elite 3: Assign to Control Nexus to grant all operators' Mood Regen +12%

Messenger's Secret.Elite 2: Assign to Reception Room to grant operators a small Clue 2 Rate-UP: TGCC (activates upon assignment; effects of the same type cannot stack)
Messenger's Secret.Elite 4: Assign to Reception Room to grant operators Clue 2 Rate-UP: TGCC (activates upon assignment; effects of the same type cannot stack)
